headline: Galas for Fashion And Retailing
abstract: Fund-raisers were held for the Fashion Scholarship Fund and the foundation of the National Retail Federation.
lead_paragraph: The Fashion Scholarship Fund, which supports the next generation of fashion talent, held a gala on Jan. 7 at the New York Hilton Midtown. And the philanthropic arm of the National Retail Federation held its awards gala on Jan. 12 at the Marriott Marquis.
